longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of Spain are allowed to enter with an expired
  normal passport. The passport is accepted when expired for a
  maximum of 5 years. 
- Nationals of Spain traveling without a passport must have a
  document accepted for entry, valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of Spain. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Spain will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Spain are expected to hold
  their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Nationals of Spain staying in Switzerland for more than 3
  months must apply for a residence permit.
- Geneva airport (GVA) is located by convention in
  Switzerland
